cw_1201592

Class Article

  • java.lang.Object
    • cw_1201592.Article

  • public class Article
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores data for an article. Instances of this class store:
    • the hash value of the article's URL;
    • the title for the bookmarked article, as a string;
    • an integer value for number of users who have tagged the article; and
    • a linked list of its annotations
    There are operations to get and set these fields, to add an annotation instance to the linked list and to calculated the size of the linked list of annotations.
    Author:
    Boqing Liu
